description: Hybrid index/definitions manifest schema for efficient subagent discovery and lookup
capabilities_briefing:
**Specialized Domains**: @agent1, @agent2, @agent3
**Code Analysis & Testing**: @test-agent1, @test-agent2
**Project & Task Management**: @project-agent1, @project-agent2
**Quality & Security**: @security-agent1, @security-agent2
**Programming Languages**: @lang-agent1, @lang-agent2

index.name: example-agent
index.purpose: Detailed description of what this agent does, when to use it, and its specific capabilities. Use PROACTIVELY for specific scenarios or tasks.

index.name: another-example-agent
index.purpose: Another detailed description showing the comprehensive purpose field that enables smart task-to-agent matching.

subagent_001.purpose: Detailed description of what this agent does, when to use it, and its specific capabilities. Use PROACTIVELY for specific scenarios or tasks.
